mapper.select: SELECT om.option_id AS option_id,om.option_name AS option_name, om.match_id AS match_id, om.category_id AS category_id, c.name AS category_name FROM ( SELECT o.id AS option_id , o.name AS option_name, m.id AS match_id, m.category_id AS category_id FROM matchs m JOIN options o on m.option_id = o.id ) om JOIN category c ON om.category_id= c.id WHERE option_id=1
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO matchs (id, category_id, option_id) VALUES(seq_matchs.NEXTVAL,#{category_id}, #{option_id})
